title: Qualitative Research Workshop for Analyzing Teacher Identity Conflicts and Their Impact on Student Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic pedagogical concepts and professional (medical/legal/technical) work experience
context.additional_context: Role-play simulations using smartphone-based VR tools recreate actual classroom situations, focusing on collecting and analyzing teacher-student interaction data

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain at least three primary causes of teacher identity conflict.
Learners can systematically interpret classroom observation data by applying narrative analysis techniques.
Learners can write student learning impact assessment reports based on data collected in simulation environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
